decl.description:
`furo-ui5-notification-list`
 Displays google.rpc.Status messages in a grouped list.
 https://github.com/googleapis/googleapis/blob/master/google/rpc/status.proto.

 Best place the furo-ui5-notification-list on the main site. then you only need one furo-ui5-notification-list.
 you can also use more than one furo-ui5-notification-list for special needs.
 But you have to be sure the furo-ui5-notification-list can receive the notification events from furo-ui5-notification.
decl.name: FuroUi5NotificationListDisplay

members.name: _FBPReady
members.description: flow is ready lifecycle method

members.name: parseGrpcStatus
members.description:
parse grpc status object and set the notification text according to the LocalizedMessage in status.
https://github.com/googleapis/googleapis/blob/master/google/rpc/status.proto.

members.name: parseNotificationMessage
_show
members.description:
shows grpc status notifications
implemented types are:
- Bad Request with Field Violations
-

members.name: _createLocalizedMessageElement
members.description: Creates notification items of type @type: "type.googleapis.com/google.rpc.LocalizedMessage"

members.name: _createHelpElements
members.description: Creates notification items of type @type: "type.googleapis.com/google.rpc.Help"

members.name: _createBadRequestElements
members.description: Creates notification items of type @type: "type.googleapis.com/google.rpc.BadRequest"

members.name: clearAll
members.description: clear all notifications

members.name: headerText
members.description: the header text of the notification

members.name: noDataText
members.description: Defines the text that is displayed when the list contains no items.

members.name: groupTitleHelp
members.description:
Defines the notification group element title for notifications of type
"type.googleapis.com/google.rpc.Help"

members.name: groupTitleBadRequest
members.description:
Defines the notification group element title for notifications of type
"type.googleapis.com/google.rpc.BadRequest"

members.name: groupTitleMessage
members.description:
Defines the notification group element title for notifications of type
"type.googleapis.com/google.rpc.LocalizedMessage"

members.name: showClose
members.description: Defines if the close button would be displayed.

events.description: Fires a notification counter changed. Use this event to show the amount of notifications to the user.
events.name: value-changed

attributes.name: header-text
attributes.description: the header text of the notification

attributes.name: show-close
attributes.description: Defines if the close button would be displayed.

attributes.name: no-data-text
attributes.description: Defines the text that is displayed when the list contains no items.

attributes.name: group-title-message
attributes.description:
Defines the notification group element title for notifications of type
"type.googleapis.com/google.rpc.LocalizedMessage"

attributes.name: group-title-help
attributes.description:
Defines the notification group element title for notifications of type
"type.googleapis.com/google.rpc.Help"

attributes.name: group-title-bad-request
attributes.description:
Defines the notification group element title for notifications of type
"type.googleapis.com/google.rpc.BadRequest"

pkg.name: @furo/ui5
pkg.description: SAP UI5 Web Components data bindings for furo

scripts.docs:generate: npm run analyze:components && npm run analyze:typerenderer && ./scripts/cem.sh
